function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of decreased ridership on public transit due to fear of contagion","Impact":"Decreased use of public transit, leading to increased traffic congestion and pollution","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to minimize the risk of contagion on public transit, such as reduced capacity, frequent disinfection, and improved ventilation","Technologies":"Disinfection and cleaning technologies, capacity monitoring systems, and improved ventilation systems","People":"Public transit users, city residents, and commuters","Owner":"Public transit authorities, city governments, and transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of bankruptcy and privatization of public transit systems","Impact":"Reduced accessibility to public transportation, increased private vehicle traffic, congestion, pollution, and social division","Mitigation":"Financial support for public transit systems, investment in infrastructure and operations, and public awareness campaigns to promote the safety of public transit","Technologies":"Financial management systems, public awareness campaigns, and infrastructure investment","People":"Public transit users, city residents, and commuters","Owner":"Public transit authorities, city governments, and transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of decreased use of public spaces","Impact":"Decreased public life, potential impact on public space management and assessment","Mitigation":"Developing strategies to promote the use and safety of public spaces, implementing protocols for assessing and managing public space use","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, public space management protocols, and safety promotion strategies","People":"City residents, urban planners, and public space users","Owner":"City governments, urban planning agencies, and public space management organizations"}]}
